DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether use active low intensity pulse ultrasound adjunct therapy follow single level posterior instrument lumbar surgery increase posterolateral success rate compare inactive ( placebo ) therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Ultrasound Adjunct Therapy Increasing Fusion Success After Lumbar Surgery
DOC.criteria: The subject document diagnosis degenerative disc disease Grade I spondylolisthesis target level Requires spinal fusion single level disc space ( L2 S1 ) use local bone graft . Requires posterolateral fusion procedure without interbody fusion procedure use posterior approach The subject fail nonoperative treatment last least 6 month . Requires spinal fusion one lumbar level . Is pregnant , lactate plan become pregnant discontinuation study treatment
